original_text: These are the things that you shall do: Speak the truth to one another; render in your gates judgments that are true and make for peace;
korean_text: 너희가 행할 일은 이러하니라 너희는 이웃과 더불어 진리를 말하며 너희 성문에서 진실하고 화평한 재판을 베풀고

sentences.original_text: These are the things that you shall do:
Speak the truth to one another;
render in your gates judgments that are true
